## What I Can Help With

I'm particularly interested in discussions about:

- **Data Science & Machine Learning** - Model development, deployment, MLOps
- **Software Development** - Python, JavaScript, web development
- **Technical Writing** - Blog collaborations, documentation
- **Open Source** - Contributing to or starting new projects
- **Mentorship** - Career advice for aspiring data scientists/developers
- **Speaking Opportunities** - Conferences, podcasts, webinars

---

## Response Time

I try to respond to all messages within **2-3 business days**. For urgent matters, please mention that in your subject line.

::: {.callout-note}
## Job Opportunities
If you're reaching out about job opportunities, please include the job description and company information. I'm primarily interested in:

- Remote-friendly positions
- Data Science/ML Engineering roles
- Technical leadership opportunities
- Interesting research projects
:::
